name: Cheesy Grilled Quesadillas
description: These cheesy quesadillas are fun to make and even more fun to eat – make sure to have some napkins on standby! Easily make these in the oven instead of using the grill: bake at 400° F for about 10 min, or until tortillas start to turn golden-brown.
preparation: Meanwhile, in Round Steamer, crumble in beef. Cover; microwave on high 4 min. Once cooked, discard liquid. Use Ground Meat Separator to break up chunks of meat. Remove from steamer and place in a large bowl with corn.
While the beef is cooking, thinly slice bell pepper.
In same steamer (don’t wash) whisk together mix and milk. Microwave, uncovered on high for 4–5 min, whisking halfway through or until thickened. Stir in cheddar.
Add half the sauce, about 3⁄4 cup, to beef and corn. Stir to combine.
Divide meat mixture and peppers on one side of each tortilla. Fold tortilla over filling. Place on grill.
Grill for 5 min, flipping halfway through, or until lightly charred.
Serve with remaining sauce (reheat in microwave, if necessary).
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies of your choice.

products.name: Ooey Gooey Queso Dip Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Just say no to fake cheese and whip up this amazing hot dip for your next get-together or taco night. With a blend of Tex-Mex spices, this real food blend creates a silky-smooth hot dip that’s packed with flavor.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
